tool_description: Analyzes competitive positioning by comparing prices, features, and market share to determine competitive advantages and threats.
error_messages: Invalid own price: own_price must be positive number
Empty competitor data: competitor_data must contain at least one price
Invalid analysis type: use basic, comprehensive, or detailed
Data quality issue: competitor_data contains invalid price values
usage: Specify product_id, own_price, and competitor_data array. Optionally set analysis_type for different levels of competitive analysis detail.

market_position.description: Position in market: premium, mid-market, discount

competitive_advantage.description: Competitive assessment: strong, moderate, weak, threatened

recommended_action.description: Suggested pricing action: maintain, increase, decrease, monitor
